sentences.en: As bottled water grows in popularity, these problems proliferate.
sentences.cn: 瓶装水越受欢迎, 这些问题越大.

sentences.en: As companies work their way down the income pyramid, the problems proliferate.
sentences.cn: 当公司沿着收入金字塔往下行,面向基层低收入广大人群时, 问题接踵而至.

sentences.en: As nuclear weapons proliferate, preventing war becomes imperative.
sentences.cn: 随着核武器不断扩散, 阻止战争越来越紧迫了.

sentences.en: Conclusion AGSRA release system can alleviate the subretinal proliferate after laser injury.
sentences.cn: 结论AGS-RA 缓释系统可以减轻激光损伤后视网膜下增生反应的形成.

sentences.en: Health food shops proliferate in this region.
sentences.cn: 保健食品店在这个地区增加了.

sentences.en: In leukemia , however, these lymphocytes proliferate abnormally.
sentences.cn: 在白血病时这些淋巴细胞异常增殖.

sentences.en: Pizza parlors proliferate in this area.
sentences.cn: 比萨饼店在这个地区扩散开来.

sentences.en: Rabbits proliferate when they have plenty of food.
sentences.cn: 兔子有充足的食物就会繁衍得很快.

sentences.en: Swine flu rages . Nukes proliferate . Bailouts beget bailouts.
sentences.cn: 猪流感肆掠、核武器扩散、救助者在求救.

sentences.en: The bacteria in water will proliferate by living on these organic substance.
sentences.cn: 水中虽有余氯,但有许多资料表明,自来水厂的水质从出厂到用户龙头呈降低趋势.

sentences.en: The cultured cells showed a declined tendency to proliferate by MTT test.
sentences.cn: mtt所反映的细胞生长状态呈下降趋势.

sentences.en: The OHand SHof cooking liquor infiltrate and proliferate into the material flakes.
sentences.cn: 蒸煮液中的OHSH渗透和扩散到料片中去.

sentences.en: There is a natural tendency for services to proliferate.
sentences.cn: 各种服务大量产生就成为一种自然的趋势.

sentences.en: We must not proliferate nuclear arms.
sentences.cn: 我们决不能扩散核武器.

trans.tran_en: if something proliferates, it increases quickly and spreads to many different places
if something proliferates, it increases quickly and spreads to many different places
